dict.string:
# Search the current document for \label{â€¦} declarations and show # these in a list, from which the user can pick.
var=`echo $TM_CURRENT_WORD|grep -v '}'` list=`grep "\\label{$var.*}"|perl -pe 's/.*\\label\{(.*?)\}(.*)\n/"$1 : $2",/'|sed 's|\\\\||g'` res=`osascript <<EOF tell application "System Events" activate choose from list { ${list:0:${#list}-1} } end tell EOF` osascript -e 'tell app "TextMate" to activate' &>/dev/null & awk <<<${res#${var}} '{ printf("%s", $1) }'
